name: Top Products by Revenue Query
query:
SELECT
    `tabShopee Product`.item_name AS product_name,
    SUM(`tabShopee Order Item`.qty) AS qty,
    SUM(`tabShopee Order Item`.model_discounted_price * `tabShopee Order Item`.qty) AS total_revenue
FROM 
    `tabShopee Order Item` INNER JOIN
    `tabShopee Order` ON `tabShopee Order Item`.parent = `tabShopee Order`.name INNER JOIN 
    `tabShopee Product` ON `tabShopee Order Item`.shopee_product = `tabShopee Product`.name
GROUP BY
    `tabShopee Product`.item_name
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
;
